alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Montgomery; Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:59AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Toombs, south central Emanuel and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 659 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Oak Park to Lyons to Uvalda, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Vidalia, Uvalda, Oak Park, Santa Claus, Alston, Center, Toombs Central, Ohoopee, New Branch, Ponderosa, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, English Eddy, Grays Landing, Rock Springs, Cedar Crossing, Johnson Corner and Charlotteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
